video.title: Rock this Boat: New Kids on the Block
video.synopsis: A select group of die-hard fans board a concert cruise with the popular boy band for a week-long voyage, full of free-spirited fun and music.

episodes.synopsis: Meet eight groups of passengers -- among the thousands who set sail to Bermuda with New Kids on the Block -- with unique reasons for coming on board.
episodes.title: Bon Voyage

episodes.synopsis: At the Masquerade Ball, Katie and Jackie plan to sneak into Donnie's VIP after-party, while Dannyelle fixes her incompetent bridesmaids' mistakes.
episodes.title: The Masquerade Ball

episodes.synopsis: Bride-to-be Dannyelle makes outrageous "bridezilla" demands; the Seattle super fans disguise themselves as waiters to sneak into the New Kids' cabin.
episodes.title: Dreams and Schemes

episodes.synopsis: A dream photo op with their favorite New Kid is a nightmare for the bikini sisters; Amanda makes a big mistake when she tries to get closer to Donnie.
episodes.title: Lights! Camera! New Kids!

episodes.synopsis: Excitement builds for the New Kids concert, where single mom Maria gets the thrill of a lifetime; Amanda is humiliated after offending Danny Wood.
episodes.title: The New Kids: LIVE!

episodes.synopsis: Katie and Jackie grab Donnie's attention at the "cowboy-up" party; the single moms go wild; Sarah from Seattle dances with a very special partner.
episodes.title: Cowboys and Blockheads

episodes.synopsis: The bikini sisters meet their nemesis in Bermuda; the single moms take dangerous risks; the Seattle super fans miss their ride back to the boat.
episodes.title: Blockheads in Bermuda

episodes.synopsis: Dannyelle's big day arrives with no word about the New Kids' attendance; Amanda finally gets the band encounter she was hoping for.
episodes.title: Wedding Bells

episodes.synopsis: As the cruise comes to an end, the ladies prepare to say goodbye to NKOTB, while the Seattle super fans get to live out a fantasy come true.
episodes.title: No Sleep 'Til New York
